txt.en: You notice the Orcs around Dor Amarth are quick to attack. They seem unorganized amongst the shattered ruins of Barad-dûr. You are unsure what plans they have, if any. However, something should be done to thin their numbers.
As the Orcs became more active after the fall of Sauron, they took to making camp in the ruins of Barad-dûr.
You have defeated many Orcs in Dor Amarth on your conquests through Gorgoroth.
Defeated many Orcs in Dor Amarth.
Orcs can be found around Dor Amarth.\n\nYou should defeat as many Orcs as possible.
